title: A widespread family of viral sponge proteins reveals specific inhibition of nucleotide signals in anti-phage defense.
authors: Chang RB, Toyoda HC, Hobbs SJ, Richmond-Buccola D, Wein T, Burger N, Chouchani ET, Sorek R, Kranzusch PJ
journal: bioRxiv : the preprint server for biology
abstract: Cyclic oligonucleotide-based antiviral signaling systems (CBASS) are bacterial anti-phage defense operons that use nucleotide signals to control immune activation. Here we biochemically screen 57 diverse
